column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Very good ramen here. In terms of gourmet ramen
column2: I've only been here and to Ramen Tatsu-ya. JINYA is slightly more expensive than Tatsu-ya
column3: however you get more bang for your buck when adding extra pork belly at JINYA. The noodles are slightly tougher than at Tatsu-ya
column4: and the broth is very savory (I like that
